text: Ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn nɨ pura ingangarir gumazir kɨnimɨn a gɨnɨghnɨghan markɨ. Bar puvatɨ. A pura nɨn ingangarir gumazir kɨnim, egha datɨrɨghɨn a bar nɨn aveghbuamra, ezɨ nɨ bar a gɨfuegham. Kɨ uabɨ an garima a Kraisɨn anav, ezɨ kɨ uan navim isava a ganɨngi. Kamaghɨn kɨ fo, nɨ bar a gɨfuegham. Nɨ an arazir a pura ingangarir gumazir kɨnim mɨn ikiava amim gɨfuegham. Egh Ekiamɨn aven nɨ aveghbuamɨn mɨn an ganɨva bar a gɨfuegham.
